description.english: Free yourself from the crate in under a minute
description.french: Sortez de la caisse en moins d'une minute
description.italian: Liberati dalla cassa in meno di un minuto
description.portuguese: Liberta-te da caixa em menos de um minuto
description.russian: Освободитесь из ящика быстрее чем за минуту
description.schinese: 一分钟内从箱子中逃脱
description.spanish: Libérate de la caja en menos de un minuto
description.tchinese: 一分鐘內從箱子中脫逃
description.german: Befreie dich aus der Kiste in unter einer Minute

description.english: Catch a fly in mid-air
description.french: Attrapez une mouche qui vole
description.italian: Cattura una mosca al volo
description.portuguese: Apanha uma mosca em pleno voo
description.schinese: 在半空中捕到一只苍蝇
description.spanish: Atrapa una mosca en el aire
description.tchinese: 在半空中捕到一隻蒼蠅
description.german: Schnapp dir eine Fliege in der Luft

displayName.italian: Non ti sentirai mai più solo
displayName.portuguese: Nunca te voltes a sentir sozinho
displayName.spanish: Nunca te volverás a sentir solo

description.english: Free your mate
description.french: Libérez votre compagnon
description.italian: Libera il tuo amico
description.portuguese: Liberta o teu companheiro
description.schinese: 释放你的伙伴
description.spanish: Libera a tu compañero
description.tchinese: 釋放你的夥伴
description.german: Befreie deinen Partner

displayName.english: Take a ride on the wild side
displayName.italian: Fai un giro nella parte selvaggia
displayName.spanish: Un viaje por el lado salvaje

description.english: Grab a beast's fur, hold tight, and take it for a ride
description.french: Accrochez-vous aux poils d'une bête, cramponnez-vous et faites une petite balade
description.italian: Afferra la pelliccia di una bestia, mantieniti forte e portala a fare un giro
description.portuguese: Agarra os pelos de uma besta, segura-te bem e vai dar uma voltinha
description.russian: Ухватитесь за гриву зверя и прокатитесь верхом
description.schinese: 抓紧野兽的毛皮，让它带着你飞奔
description.spanish: Agarra la piel de una bestia, sujétale fuerte y arrástrale
description.tchinese: 抓緊野獸的毛皮，讓它帶著你飛奔
description.german: Krall dich ins Fell einer Bestie und halte dich fest

description.english: Parry a sting projectile
description.french: Parez un projectile piquant
description.italian: Schiva un proiettile pungente
description.portuguese: Desvia um projétil de ferrão
description.schinese: 闪避射刺
description.spanish: Esquiva un proyectil con aguijón
description.tchinese: 閃避射刺
description.german: Parriere einen fliegenden Stachel

displayName.portuguese: Quem é que deixou aquilo no caminho?
displayName.german: Wer hat's eigentlich hier hin getan?

description.english: Find a pine in the mine
description.french: Trouvez une pomme de pin dans la mine
description.italian: Trova una pigna nella miniera
description.portuguese: Encontra uma pinha na mina
description.schinese: 在矿井中找到一个松果。
description.spanish: Encuentra una piña en la mina
description.tchinese: 在礦井中找到一個松果。
description.german: Finde einen Tannenzapfen in der Miene

description.english: Don't get hit by a dart trap before the cave
description.french: Ne vous faites pas toucher par une trappe à piques avant la grotte
description.italian: Non farti colpire da una trappola con la freccia prima di raggiungere la cava
description.portuguese: Não sejas atingido por uma armadilha de dardos antes da caverna
description.russian: Не попадитесь в ловушку с дротиками у входа в пещеру
description.schinese: 不要被洞穴前的飞镖陷阱击中
description.spanish: No dejes que te golpee una trampa de dardo antes de la cueva
description.tchinese: 不要被洞穴前的飛鏢陷阱擊中
description.german: Lass dich vor der Höhle von keiner Pfeilfalle treffen

description.english: Use all burs by the river
description.french: Utilisez toutes les bogues près de la rivière
description.italian: Usa tutti i ricci che trovi in riva al fiume
description.portuguese: Usa todas as rebarbas junto ao rio
description.schinese: 使用河边的所有刺果
description.spanish: Usa todos los abrojos al lado del río
description.tchinese: 使用河邊的所有刺果
description.german: Verwende alle Kletten beim Fluss

displayName.italian: Attento a dove metti i piedi

description.english: Roll a boulder over a fly
description.french: Faites rouler un rocher sur une mouche
description.italian: Rotola un macigno su una mosca
description.portuguese: Faz rolar uma pedra sobre uma mosca
description.schinese: 滚动圆石压过苍蝇
description.spanish: Lanza rodando una roca sobre una mosca
description.tchinese: 滾動圓石壓過蒼蠅
description.german: Rolle einen Felsbrock über eine Fliege

displayName.english: It was never meant to work like this
displayName.spanish: Esto se supone que no funciona así

description.english: Defeat the teleporting beast with a fly
description.french: Battez la bête qui se téléporte avec une mouche
description.italian: Sconfiggi la bestia teleportatrice con una mosca
description.portuguese: Derrota a besta do teletransporte com uma mosca
description.russian: Одолейте телепортирующегося зверя с помощью мухи
description.schinese: 用一只苍蝇打败会瞬移的野兽
description.spanish: Derrota a la bestia teletransportadora con una mosca
description.tchinese: 用一隻蒼蠅打敗會瞬移的野獸
description.german: Besieg die teleportierende Bestie mit einer Fliege

description.english: Defeat a beast with a stick
description.french: Battez une bête avec un bâton
description.italian: Sconfiggi la bestia con una stecca
description.portuguese: Derrota uma besta com um pau
description.schinese: 用一根刺打败野兽
description.spanish: Derrota a una bestia con un palo
description.tchinese: 用一根刺打敗野獸
description.german: Besiege eine Bestie mit einem Stock

description.english: Provoke an inchworm to hit another
description.french: Faites cogner une chenille dans une autre
description.italian: Provoca un bruco per fargliene colpire un altro
description.portuguese: Provoca uma minhoca para que esta acerte noutra
description.schinese: 激怒一只尺蠖攻击另一只
description.spanish: Provoca a una oruga para que golpee a otra
description.tchinese: 激怒一隻尺蠖攻擊另一隻
description.german: Provoziere einen Wurm einen anderen zu treffen

description.english: Lure 10 ticks into a fenlight
description.french: Attirez 10 tiques dans une boule de feu luisante
description.italian: Attrai 10 zecche in una sfera infuocata della palude
description.portuguese: Atrai 10 pulgas até ao fogo-fátuo
description.schinese: 引诱 10 只壁虱进入火球
description.spanish: Atrae a 10 garrapatas a una bola de fuego
description.tchinese: 引誘 10 隻壁虱進入火球
description.german: Locke 10 Zecken in ein Sumpflicht

description.english: Avoid all the pit traps
description.french: Évitez toutes les trappes
description.italian: Evita tutte le trappole della cava
description.portuguese: Evita todas as armadilhas do poço
description.russian: Не угодите ни в одну яму-ловушку
description.schinese: 避开所有陷坑
description.spanish: Evita todas las trampas de lava
description.tchinese: 避開所有陷坑
description.german: Stürze nicht in die Fallgruben

description.english: Defeat all beasts
description.french: Battez toutes les bêtes
description.italian: Sconfiggi tutte le bestie
description.portuguese: Derrota todas as bestas
description.schinese: 打败所有野兽
description.spanish: Derrota a todas las bestias
description.tchinese: 打敗所有野獸
description.german: Besiege alle Bestien

description.english: Complete a chapter without eating a midge
description.french: Terminez un chapitre sans manger un moucheron
description.italian: Completa un capitolo senza mangiare nessun moscerino
description.portuguese: Completa um capítulo sem comer mosquitos
description.schinese: 不吃一只蚊子完成一章
description.spanish: Completa un capítulo sin comer ningún mosquito
description.tchinese: 不吃一隻蚊子完成一章
description.german: Beende ein Kapitel ohne eine Mücke zu essen

description.english: Escape the collapsing mine without being crushed
description.french: Fuyez la mine qui s'écroule sans vous faire broyer
description.italian: Fuggi dalla miniera che crolla senza farti schiacciare
description.portuguese: Escapa da mina em colapso se seres esmagado
description.russian: Выскочите из обрушивающегося рудника так, чтобы вас не завалило
description.schinese: 在不被压到的情况下逃离崩塌的矿井
description.spanish: Escapa de la mina derrumbándose sin que te aplaste
description.tchinese: 在不被壓到的情況下逃離崩塌的礦井
description.german: Entkomme aus der zusammenstürzenden Mine ohne zerquetscht zu werden

description.english: Don't get squashed by a hanging weight
description.french: Ne vous faites pas écraser par les masses suspendues
description.italian: Non farti schiacciare dal peso in sospensione
description.portuguese: Não sejas esmagado por um peso pendurado
description.schinese: 不要被悬挂的重物挤到
description.spanish: No dejes que un peso colgante te aplaste
description.tchinese: 不要被懸掛的重物擠到
description.german: Werde von keinem Gewicht erschlagen

description.english: Defeat the three beasts in the ruins without the use of traps
description.french: Battez les trois bêtes dans les ruines sans utiliser de trappe
description.italian: Sconfiggi le tre bestie nelle rovine senza usare le trappole
description.portuguese: Derrota as três bestas nas ruínas sem usar armadilhas
description.russian: Одолейте трех зверей в руинах, не пользуясь ловушками
description.schinese: 在不用陷井的情况下打败废墟中的三只野兽
description.spanish: Derrota a las tres bestias en las ruinas sin usar las trampas
description.tchinese: 在不用陷阱的情況下打敗廢墟中的三隻野獸
description.german: Besiege die drei Bestien in der Ruine ohne eine Falle zu verwenden

description.english: Die during the quake after defeating a beast
description.french: Mourez lors du tremblement de terre après avoir vaincu une bête
description.italian: Muori durante il terremoto dopo aver sconfitto una bestia
description.portuguese: Morre durante o terramoto depois de derrotares uma besta
description.russian: Умрите во время землетрясения после победы над зверем
description.schinese: 打败野兽后在地震中丧生
description.spanish: Muere durante el terremoto después de derrotar a una bestia
description.tchinese: 打敗野獸後在地震中喪生
description.german: Sterbe während dem Beben nachdem du ein Biest besiegt hast
